title: 2001 Logo
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130818164208im_/http:/typophile.com/files/1_4199.jpg)
  
Lots of close matches but I can't put my finger on this one.
author: akovia

comments.content: Maybe a blurry version of Helvetica Rounded Cond Bold
I'm thinking it must be custom. Helvetica was close but I didn't give the whole sample. (my bad) I just made it from scratch instead since it was pretty easy. Thanks for you suggestion.
I think you nailed it akira. They did make some little mods with the R and the O, but the rest is spot on!
